greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in an asymptotic expansion of A003319(n)/n! in falling factorials.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..446
L. Comtet, Sur les coefficients de l'inverse de la série formelle Sum n! t^n, Comptes Rend. Acad. Sci. Paris, A 275 (1972), 569-572.
L. Comtet, Series inversions, C. R. Acad. Sc. Paris, t. 275 (25 septembre 1972), 569-572. (Annotated scanned copy)
R. K. Guy, Letter to N. J. A. Sloane, Mar 1974
formula: Expansion of (1-g(x))^2, where g(x) is the g.f. of A003319.
For n>0, a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} A260503(k) * Stirling1(n-1, k-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Assuming[Element[x,Reals], Series[E^(2/x) * x^2 / ExpIntegralEi[1/x]^2, {x,0,25}]], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 03 2015 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 03 2015, following a suggestion from _R. K. Guy_, Apr 29 1974
